SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.audio

Class WaterAnimalSoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.audio.WaterAnimalSoundPlayer
public class WaterAnimalSoundPlayer extends Object
WaterAnimalSoundPlayer class responsible for managing the playback of water-animal-related sounds. This class focuses on handling the swimming sounds.

  • Method Details

    • playSwimmingSound

      public void playSwimmingSound(float volume)
      Plays the swimming sound in a loop.
      Parameters:
      volume - the volume at which to play the sound (0.0f to 1.0f)

    • stopSwimmingSound

      public void stopSwimmingSound()
      Stops the swimming sound if it is playing.

    • updateSwimmingSound

      public void updateSwimmingSound(boolean isSwimming, float volume)
      Updates the playing state of the swimming sound.
      Parameters:
      isSwimming - whether the water animal is swimming and should play the swimming sound
      volume - the volume at which to play the sound (0.0f to 1.0f)
